member.name: T:OntaviSDK.Azure.AzureBlobStorageEndpoint
member.summary: Describes an Azure Blob Storage account that in a [[Pipeline]] will consume.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.Azure.AzureBlobStorageEndpoint.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure Storage connection string for the endpoint.

member.name: T:OntaviSDK.Azure.ListBlobsMiddleware
member.summary: Gets a list of blobs from Azure storage.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.Azure.ListBlobsMiddleware.StorageEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the from which to list blobs.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.Azure.ListBlobsMiddleware.ContainerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the container from which to get a list of blobs.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.Azure.ListBlobsMiddleware.List
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of files in blob storage.

member.name: T:OntaviSDK.Azure.ReadBlobMiddleware
member.summary: Reads a blob from Azure storage and outputs the blob content.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.Azure.ReadBlobMiddleware.StorageEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the from which the blob should be read.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.Azure.ReadBlobMiddleware.ContainerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the container in which the blob resides.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.Azure.ReadBlobMiddleware.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file in blob storage to read.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.Azure.ReadBlobMiddleware.FileContents
member.summary: Gets or sets the contents of the file in blob storage.
